Package Algorithms

Interface RobotAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SonicAlgorithmV1, SonicAlgorithmV2, SonicAlgorithmV3
    public interface RobotAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    An interface for Robot's game strategy. The strategy algorithm shall make choices in game depending on current game situation and its inner-algorithms such as Path-Finding algorithm, the algorithm shall also decide the starting position the robot's think is best according to the strategy.
    Author:
    Ofek Bader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void calculate()
      Calculate strategy, recommended if not must to call this function before making any game-decision based choice such as Movement orientation and starting position.
      RobotAlgorithm clone()
      Clones this algorithm
      double getPlayerOrientation()
      Get player's next move according to inner algorithm.
      Point3D getPlayerStartPosition()
      Get the player starting position chosen by the robot.
      void refreshGameStatus​(Game game)
      Refresh/Update game status, so the algorithm will have the ability to calculate correct and effective result relative to current game's status.

    • Method Detail

      • calculate

        void calculate()
        Calculate strategy, recommended if not must to call this function before making any game-decision based choice such as Movement orientation and starting position.

      • getPlayerOrientation

        double getPlayerOrientation()
        Get player's next move according to inner algorithm.
        Returns:
        Orientation in degrees [0-360] in double precision.

      • getPlayerStartPosition

        Point3D getPlayerStartPosition()
        Get the player starting position chosen by the robot.
        Note: some algorithm would need to be calculated first using the "calculate()" function to generate the starting position.
        Returns:
        Point3D starting position in game (in Polar)

      • refreshGameStatus

        void refreshGameStatus​(Game game)
        Refresh/Update game status, so the algorithm will have the ability to calculate correct and effective result relative to current game's status.
        Parameters:
        game -

      • clone

        RobotAlgorithm clone()
        Clones this algorithm
        Returns:
        same type of algorithm, different instance.
